location.title: Location
location.description: Location to search for Airbnb listings (e.g., 'Miami, FL', 'New York, NY')

numberOfListings.title: Number of Listings
numberOfListings.description: Maximum number of listing URLs to extract

minDelayBetweenRequests.title: Minimum Delay Between Requests (ms)
minDelayBetweenRequests.description: Minimum delay in milliseconds between requests to avoid rate limiting

maxDelayBetweenRequests.title: Maximum Delay Between Requests (ms)
maxDelayBetweenRequests.description: Maximum delay in milliseconds between requests to appear more human-like
